pkgsearch 3.1.2.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Advanced CRAN package search

Source: R/advanced_search.R
advanced_search.Rd

See the Elastic documentation for the syntax and features: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-query-string-query.html

advanced_search(
  ...,
  json = NULL,
  format = c("short", "long"),
  from = 1,
  size = 10
)

Arguments

...

Search terms. For named terms, the name specifies the field to search for. For unnamed ones, the term is taken as is. The individual terms are combined with the AND operator.

json

A character string that contains the query to send to Elastic. If this is not NULL, then you cannot specify any search terms in ....

format

Default formatting of the results. short only outputs the name and title of the packages, long also prints the author, last version, full description and URLs. Note that this only affects the default printing, and you can still inspect the full results, even if you specify short here.

from

Where to start listing the results, for pagination.

size

The number of results to list.

Value

Search hits.

Examples

# All orphaned packages
advanced_search(Maintainer = "ORPHANED")
#> - "advanced search" ----------------------------- 4 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package   version  by         @ title                                  
#>  1  100 shipunov  1.17.1   ORPHANED 10M Miscellaneous Functions from Alexey ...
#>  2   99 udunits2  0.13.2.1 ORPHANED  2y Udunits-2 Bindings for R               
#>  3   98 fastclime 1.4.1.1  ORPHANED  7M A Fast Solver for Parameterized LP P...
#>  4   96 overlap   0.3.4.1  ORPHANED  3d Estimates of Coefficient of Overlapp...

# Packages with both Hester and Wickham as authors
advanced_search(Author = "Hester", Author = "Wickham")
#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 21 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package     version by                  @ title                        
#>   1 100 mockery     0.4.4   Hadley Wickham     2M Mocking Library for R        
#>   2  98 pkgbuild    1.4.2   Gábor Csárdi       5M Find Tools Needed to Build...
#>   3  89 memoise     2.0.1   Winston Chang      2y 'Memoisation' of Functions   
#>   4  84 xml2        1.3.5   Hadley Wickham     5M Parse XML                    
#>   5  82 odbc        1.3.5   Hadley Wickham     5M Connect to ODBC Compatible...
#>   6  82 devtools    2.4.5   Jennifer Bryan     1y Tools to Make Developing R...
#>   7  81 sessioninfo 1.2.2   Gábor Csárdi       2y R Session Information        
#>   8  74 remotes     2.4.2.1 Gábor Csárdi       4M R Package Installation fro...
#>   9  74 meltr       1.0.1   Duncan Garmonsway  1y Read Non-Rectangular Text ...
#>  10  70 pkgload     1.3.3   Lionel Henry       2M Simulate Package Installat...
advanced_search("Author: Hester AND Author: Wickham")
#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 21 packages in 0.002 seconds -
#>   #     package     version by                  @ title                        
#>   1 100 mockery     0.4.4   Hadley Wickham     2M Mocking Library for R        
#>   2  98 pkgbuild    1.4.2   Gábor Csárdi       5M Find Tools Needed to Build...
#>   3  89 memoise     2.0.1   Winston Chang      2y 'Memoisation' of Functions   
#>   4  84 xml2        1.3.5   Hadley Wickham     5M Parse XML                    
#>   5  82 odbc        1.3.5   Hadley Wickham     5M Connect to ODBC Compatible...
#>   6  82 devtools    2.4.5   Jennifer Bryan     1y Tools to Make Developing R...
#>   7  81 sessioninfo 1.2.2   Gábor Csárdi       2y R Session Information        
#>   8  74 remotes     2.4.2.1 Gábor Csárdi       4M R Package Installation fro...
#>   9  74 meltr       1.0.1   Duncan Garmonsway  1y Read Non-Rectangular Text ...
#>  10  70 pkgload     1.3.3   Lionel Henry       2M Simulate Package Installat...

# Packages with Hester but not Wickham as author
advanced_search(Author = "Hester AND NOT Wickham")
#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 26 packages in 0.004 seconds -
#>   #     package        version by                        @ title               
#>   1 100 knitrBootstrap 1.0.2   Jim Hester               5y 'knitr' Bootstrap...

#>   3  87 primerTree     1.0.6   Matt Cannon              2y Visually Assessin...
#>   4  77 gmailr         2.0.0   Jennifer Bryan           5M Access the 'Gmail...
#>   5  72 rex            1.2.1   Kevin Ushey              2y Friendly Regular ...
#>   6  69 roger          1.5.1   Vincent Goulet          28d Automated Grading...
#>   7  66 spelling       2.2.1   Jeroen Ooms              8M Tools for Spell C...
#>   8  65 available      1.1.0   Gábor Csárdi             1y Check if the Titl...
#>   9  64 tidycode       0.1.1   Lucy D'Agostino McGowan  4y Analyze Lines of ...
#>  10  60 brio           1.1.3   Gábor Csárdi             2y Basic R Input Output

# Packages with Hester as an Author, and Wickham in any field
advanced_search(Author = "Hester", "Wickham")

#>   #     package     version by               @ title

# Packages with Hester as an Author and Wickham nowhere in the metadata
advanced_search(Author = "Hester", "NOT Wickham")

# Packages for permutation tests and permissive licenses
advanced_search("permutation test AND NOT License: GPL OR GNU")
#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 471 packages in 0.02 seconds -
#>   #     package       version by                         @ title               
#>   1 100 phd           0.2     Jesse Hemerik             2y Permutation Testi...
#>   2  93 confSAM       0.2     Jesse Hemerik             6y Estimates and Bou...
#>   3  83 permutes      2.8     Cesko C. Voeten           2M Permutation Tests...
#>   4  77 BurStMisc     1.1     Pat Burns                 7y Burns Statistics ...
#>   5  77 packager      1.15.2  Andreas Dominik Cullmann  3M Create, Build and...
#>   6  77 USP           0.1.2   Thomas B. Berrett         3y U-Statistic Permu...

#>   9  69 MultSurvTests 0.2     Lukas Arnroth             2y Permutation Tests...
#>  10  68 IMEC          0.2.0   Maximilian Maier          3y Ising Model of Ex...

# Packages that have a certain field
advanced_search("_exists_" = "URL")
#> - "advanced search" ------------------------- 11875 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package        version by                      @ title                 
#>   1 100 opentimsr      1.0.13  Michał Piotr Startek   2y An Open-Source Load...
#>   2 100 rsofun         4.4     Stocker Benjamin      22d The P-Model and Bio...
#>   3 100 rapidphylo     0.1.2   Arindam RoyChoudhury  10M Rapidly Estimates P...
#>   4 100 npsp           0.7.11  Ruben Fernandez-Casal  7M Nonparametric Spati...
#>   5 100 datagovindia   1.0.5   Abhishek Arora         2y Data.gov.in API Wra...
#>   6 100 gatoRs         1.0.0   Natalie N. Patten      5M Geographic and Taxo...
#>   7 100 oaii           0.1.8   Cezary Kuran           4M 'OpenAI' API R Inte...
#>   8 100 polars         0.7.0   Tatsuya Shima          4M Lightning-Fast 'Dat...
#>   9 100 epi2me2r       0.1.0   Quentin D. Read        1y Process Nanopore EP...
#>  10 100 chromatographR 0.4.4   Ethan Bass             1y Chromatographic Dat...

# Packages that do not have a certain field:
advanced_search("NOT _exists_: URL")
#> - "advanced search" -------------------------- 9514 packages in 0.002 seconds -
#>   #     package        version by               @ title                        
#>   1 100 via            0.2.0   Adam T. Kocsis  6M Virtual Arrays               
#>   2 100 manifold       0.1.1   Xiongtao Dai    1y Operations for Riemannian ...
#>   3 100 cuml4r         0.1.0   Yitao Li        2y R Interface for the RAPIDS...
#>   4 100 flashlighttext 0.1.0   Athos Damiani   5M Flashlight Text R Interface  
#>   5 100 scTEP          0.1.0   Yifan Zhang     1y Single-Cell Trajectory Inf...
#>   6 100 epitopR        0.1.2   Joan Zhang      1y Predict Peptide-MHC Binding  
#>   7 100 maple          0.99.5  Carter Allen    2y Bayesian Analysis of Multi...
#>   8 100 BIDistances    0.0.2   Quirin Stier    6M Bioinformatic Distances      
#>   9 100 gremes         0.1.1   Stefka Asenova  9M Estimation of Tail Depende...
#>  10 100 argosfilter    0.70    Carla Freitas   1y Argos Locations Filter       

# The same but as JSON query
query <- '{
"query": {
  "bool": {
    "must_not": {
      "exists": {
        "field": "URL"
      }
    }
  }
}
}'
advanced_search(json = query)
#> - "advanced search" -------------------------- 9514 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package        version by               @ title                        
#>   1 100 via            0.2.0   Adam T. Kocsis  6M Virtual Arrays               
#>   2 100 manifold       0.1.1   Xiongtao Dai    1y Operations for Riemannian ...
#>   3 100 cuml4r         0.1.0   Yitao Li        2y R Interface for the RAPIDS...
#>   4 100 flashlighttext 0.1.0   Athos Damiani   5M Flashlight Text R Interface  
#>   5 100 scTEP          0.1.0   Yifan Zhang     1y Single-Cell Trajectory Inf...
#>   6 100 epitopR        0.1.2   Joan Zhang      1y Predict Peptide-MHC Binding  
#>   7 100 maple          0.99.5  Carter Allen    2y Bayesian Analysis of Multi...
#>   8 100 BIDistances    0.0.2   Quirin Stier    6M Bioinformatic Distances      
#>   9 100 gremes         0.1.1   Stefka Asenova  9M Estimation of Tail Depende...
#>  10 100 argosfilter    0.70    Carla Freitas   1y Argos Locations Filter       

# Regular expressions
advanced_search(Author = "/Joh?nathan/")

#>   #     package     version by                           @ title

# Fuzzy search
advanced_search(Author = "Johnathan~1")
